news.title: Zoom Lied to Users About End-to-End Encryption for Years, FTC Says
news.description: Zoom offered a lower level of security than advertised and has agreed with the FTC to create a comprehensive security program and refrain from privacy and security misrepresentations.

news.title: California Just Passed Tougher Privacy Rules That May Reverberate Nationwide
news.description: Voters approved Proposition 24, which will impose stiffer fines on companies that break certain data privacy rules and create a new state agency to help enforce privacy laws.

news.title: Appeals Court Rejects Affirmative Action Lawsuit Against Harvard
news.description: Since Harvard did not engage in racial balancing or use quotas, the judges found that its limited consideration of race in admissions was a legitimate effort to achieve student diversity.

news.title: Supreme Court Appears Likely To Uphold Obamacare
news.description: Both liberal and conservative judges showed skepticism toward the argument that the Affordable Care Act should be struck down in its entirety if the individual mandate is removed.
